Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Western
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Archer, Western and 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 35th, Archer, Western and 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Western.

Allow extra travel time.
